ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.utilities

Class RecordingHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.utilities.RecordingHandler

  • public class RecordingHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Since handling recordings is not a trivial task, here are some functions that are helping with creating and updating recording entries in the db.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RecordingHandler() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void deleteRecording(int recording_id)
      Method to safely delete a recording by its id.
      static int getCurrentRecordingID() 
      static void startRecording()
      Add an recording entry into the database.
      static void stopRecoding()
      Update the latest recording with the current time.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecordingHandler

        public RecordingHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • startRecording

        public static void startRecording()
        Add an recording entry into the database. This uses the current time and the current set patient. Since this method can be called anywhere in the application, it is necessary to start a new thread in which the db operation is executed

      • stopRecoding

        public static void stopRecoding()
        Update the latest recording with the current time. Since this method can be called anywhere in the application, it is necessary to start a new thread in which the db operation is executed

      • getCurrentRecordingID

        public static int getCurrentRecordingID()

      • deleteRecording

        public static void deleteRecording(int recording_id)
        Method to safely delete a recording by its id.
        Parameters:
        recording_id - Given recording_id which is unique in the db.
